verbs.description: sac jewish community honors [V: lives] [ARG0: of pittsburgh shooting victims] the jewish community in sacramento came together sunday evening to remember the lives of the 11 people killed in a shooting at a pittsburgh synagogue roughly two dozen people of different faiths were in attendance to show solidarity praying together during the service this is in honor of rich gottfried said a woman who lit a candle at a prayer service sunday at chabad of greater sacramento one by one 11 candles were lit and the names of kcra tv stockton chabad of greater sacramento pittsburgh sacramento yanki hecht congregation b’nai israel modesto kcra rabbi mendy cohen modesto california congregation bnai israel pittsburgh synagogue sheri rosenblum rich gottfried sacramento california
